name: AvilA Solutions
tag_list: usa-jobs, software-consulting, developer, staffing, programmer, software-development, staffing-service, it-outsourcing, software-outsourcing, recruiting, h1b-visa-jobs, employment-service, staffing-solution, staffing-now
overview:
Avila is consulting, technology, outsourcing, strategic staffing and local professional services. To use expertise to the benefit of Avila’s clients and partners through an open, Collaborative approach.

AvilA looking for candidates with Bachelor’s or Master’s Degree, Talented and enthusiastic candidates who want to grow and make career with the company are most welcome; Knowledge in technologies like C, C++, Java, Sybase, Perl, Unix, Oracle will be an added advantage. Selected Candidates will be trained on Software Technologies and will be deployed in projects.

AVILA Software Solutions is a Software Developing and Information Management organization providing most talented staffing solutions and services with offices at Nashua-NH. AVILA is well known in application maintenance and development outsourcing in the Financial services, Retail and Distribution, Manufacturing, Telecommunications and High-tech industries.

Join AvilA for career. Enjoy the work.
